snippet: In the six years the Nieves sisters have been group-coaching the team at St. Margaret of Cortona School in Riverdale, they have compiled a winning record and a devoted local following.
abstract: Character Study column on Gina, Angela and Cristina Nieves, sisters who have been group coaching girls' basketball team at St Margaret of Cortona School in Riverdale for six years, compiling a winning record and devoted local following.
lead_paragraph: In the six years the Nieves sisters have been group-coaching the team at St. Margaret of Cortona School in Riverdale, they have compiled a winning record and a devoted local following.

headline.seo: Three Sisters Coach Girls Basketball in Riverdale
